圱字的基本解释

圱
qiān
三里田。
古同“阡”。

圱
sú
古同“俗”。

圱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》蒼先切，平先，清。］
亦作“圲1”。
(1)三里田。
(2)同“阡”。
[②]［sú］
［《集韻》松玉切，入燭，邪。］
亦作“圲2”。同“俗1”。

圱字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　圱； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页224第12
【廣韻】【集韻】?倉先切，音千。【倉頡篇】三里田爲圱。　又【集韻】俗古作圱。註詳人部七畫。

圱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
圱字的起名意思

暂无。

圱
Basic explanation of words
圱
qiān
Sanlitian.
Ancient Tong "Qian".
圱
sú
Ancient with "vulgar".
圱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiān］
["Guangyun" Cang first cut, level first, clear. ]
Also known as "Ba 1".
(1) Sanlitian.
(2) Same as "Qian".
[②]［sú］
["Ji Yun" pine jade cut, into the candle, evil. ]
Also known as "Ba 2". Same as "vulgar 1".
圱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　圱; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 224-12
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Cang first cut, sound thousands. 【Cangjie Article】Sanlitian is a 圱.　[Jiyun] Vulgar and ancient works. Note the seven paintings of the human department.
